mapper.select: SELECT q.readable, q.member_no, b.board_no, c.name, b.title, b.view_count, b.registered_date FROM pf_qna q JOIN pf_question_category c ON c.category_no = q.category_no JOIN pf_board b ON q.board_no = b.board_no ORDER BY b.registered_date DESC, b.board_no DESC

SELECT q.member_no, b.board_no, c.name, b.title, b.view_count, b.registered_date, b.content FROM pf_qna q JOIN pf_question_category c ON c.category_no = q.category_no JOIN pf_board b ON q.board_no = b.board_no WHERE b.board_no = #{no}
